name: Analyze Cytokine Production in CD4+ T Cells
description: Analyze cytokine production in CD4+ T cells after antigen stimulation using intracellular flow cytometry

params.name: fcs_files_dict_json
params.description: Dictionary mapping condition names to FCS file paths (JSON object, e.g., '{"control": "/path/to/control.fcs", "stimulated": "/path/to/stimulated.fcs"}')
